document_data.name: Sandrew
document_data.mainbody: Savant '''Sandrew''', usually know as '''Sandrew the Wise''', was the leading [[cleric]] of [[Oghma]] in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History:
Sandrew hailed from the [[Silver Marches]] and in [[1358 DR]] he was working at the [[Halls of Inspiration]] in [[Silverymoon]].

He later settled in Waterdeep, ''circa'' [[1362 DR]], with the objective of building a temple and a library worthy of his god and the City of Splendors. As part of this effort he recruited many clerics from his former temple.

In the {{YearlinkName|1371}},{{DDTS}} on the 17{{th}} and 18{{th}} of Eleint, Sandrew was officiating the wedding ceremony between the [[Open Lord]] of [[Waterdeep]] [[Piergeiron the Paladinson]] and [[Eidola]] of [[Neverwinter]]. The event was swept away by a whirlwind of sinister plots around the wedding.

He was later one of four clerics of Oghma among the many powerful mages that [[Khelben Arunsun]] brought together in the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, in order to cleanse part of the [[High Moor]] and restore [[Faer'tel'miir]], a lost city of [[Miyeritar]].
